interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: SHIONLE - Semi Matte Air Lipstick: Creamy semi matte lipstick | Long Lasting | Great Coverage | Creamy Texture | 06 CRUSH BERRY | 3.3g
Review Date: 2021/07/18
Store: SHIONLE
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'SHIONLE', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Moisturizing', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 3 x 1 inches; 0.12 Ounces'}
Review Text: Slightly browner than expected, but it still is a color that works with my skin tone. It lasts as long as any lipstick, so not forever, but good enough. It doesn't feel too thick on my lips. Overall this one was a win.
Review Title: A win
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
AuroTrends Makeup Remover Towel,2 Pack Reusable Chemical-free Microfiber Makeup Remover Cloths,Magically and Gently Wipe Away Cosmetics,Sunscreen,Oil and Dirt,Set of 2 (Pink+Black) AuroTrends {'Brand': 'AuroTrends', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 2.72 x 1.42 inches; 6.4 Ounces'} These are really soft. Also, even when they are soaking wet, they don't feel drippy. I am weird about having water on/in my face, and these cloths allow me to wash my face without triggering an odd anxious feeling. I really like these cloths and always keep one on hand. Really Soft TELETIES - Spiral Hair Coils - Ponytail Holder Hair Ties for Women - Phone Cord Hair Ties - Strong Grip, No Rip, Water Resistant, No Crease Hair Tie Coils - 3 pack (Large, Maliblu) Teleties {'Material': 'Fabric', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Teleties', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Pieces': '3', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 1.2 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '711841892807'} I love telephone cord style hair ties. They gather all of my hair into a ponytail or bun easily and, best of all, they don't give me headaches like more traditional hair elastics. These are a pretty combination of aqua blue and white, and they are very sturdy. No Headaches RAREKIND Fade Matte Lipstick by Amorepacific - 10 Colors, Cruelty-Free Nourishing Lip Stick, Velvety-smooth, Long-Lasting Moisturizing Lipstick - 3.2g Maple Road RAREKIND {'Package Dimensions': '3.3 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.95 Ounces'} Eh. The color is bit more orange-y than I’d hoped for by the photo. It’s really thick. It doesn’t stay put or feel great on. I might try mixing it with some gloss if I liked the color more. Not thrilled Reusable Cotton Swab Portable Silicone Swab Washable Cotton Swabs for Ear Cleaning Beauty Treatment Makeup Cotton Swab JAOYU {'Product Dimensions': '3.2 x 3.2 x 0.39 inches', 'UPC': '739232135913'} I was skeptical. I am autistic, and I hate the feel of water in my ears, so I use cotton swabs to dry my ears after a shower. This adds up to a lot of swabs and I felt guilty about putting that many into the trash when I could make a tiny difference environmentally. I didn't really think the silicone option would work. The cotton soaks up the water. But the little knobby end actually does pull the water out of my ear canal.

The case is fine. I feel like the rubber bit that holds it together will eventually break. It is just flimsy. But, for now, it does its job. I ordered the blue, and it is a pretty dull blue, but the swab works, so whatever. It Works KISSIO Lipstick Set,4Pcs Cigarette Matte Lipstick Set,Red Matte Pigmentation Lipstick,Long Lasting Waterproof Lipstick for women KISSIO {'Brand': 'KISSIO', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Cleansing,Moisturizing,Long-lasting,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '10.79 x 8.27 x 0.47 inches; 2.01 Ounces'} These are fine. They don't stay very well though, and they make my lips a bit dry, so I still end up adding a lip balm over top, and that sort of ruins the matte finish. The color is good. I like the size of the container as well, like a lip balm. Nice Colors Long Curly Wig for Women Black Long Wavy Wigs with Bangs Synthetic Replacement Wig Heat Resistant Natural Looking for Daily Party Cosplay (Black) GUDEMAY {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'GUDEMAY', 'Package Dimensions': '10.98 x 9.96 x 2.32 inches; 10.86 Ounces', 'UPC': '779880641428'} [[VIDEOID:da59496c84540ec5e1ead467d50fa820]] I adore this wig.

So, it isn't black. It is brown. Or else, they accidentally sent me the brown version. Regardless, I love how it looks on. The hair doesn't have that super-shiny fake look of plastic. It falls nicely. I will post a photo. Pretty! 2PCS Wine Red&Black mixed Brown 14''Short Curly Bob Wig with Air Bangs for Women Shoulder Length Wavy Wigs Synthetic Heat Resistant Fiber Hair Medium Length Glueless Wig for Daily Wear OSWINMART {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '14 x 9.5 x 8.5 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'OSWINMART', 'Product Dimensions': '14 x 9.5 x 8.5 inches; 1.08 Pounds', 'UPC': '732043538942'} I like the darker one a lot. The lengths for both wigs are good, and the bangs work pretty well. Although I prefer the darker one, other people have commented that they like the reddish one better. So both work well and look good on. The darker one is super close to my real style on a good hair day, just with added bangs, so I am sure I will get a lot of use out of it. Both are Great! SHIONLE - Semi Matte Air Lipstick: Creamy semi matte lipstick | Long Lasting | Great Coverage | Creamy Texture | 06 CRUSH BERRY | 3.3g SHIONLE {'Brand': 'SHIONLE', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Moisturizing', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 3 x 1 inches; 0.12 Ounces'} Slightly browner than expected, but it still is a color that works with my skin tone. It lasts as long as any lipstick, so not forever, but good enough. It doesn't feel too thick on my lips. Overall this one was a win. A win
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to explore eco-friendly skincare and hair accessories, now incorporating stylish lip products into their routine. Their recent purchase highlights a growing interest in vibrant lip colors that balance visual impact with quality.

- **Material Preference:** A continued appreciation for soft, high-quality materials is evident, with an openness to experimenting with various textures, including creamy lip formulations. The user values both synthetic and natural materials that enhance comfort and durability.

- **Skin Sensitivity:** Past challenges with skin sensitivity influence product choices, prompting a careful selection process that prioritizes compatibility and comfort, particularly in cosmetics. 

- **Functionality:** The user emphasizes the importance of practicality and effectiveness in their beauty routine. Their latest interaction indicates a desire for long-lasting, moisturizing lip products that maintain a light feel, aligning with their aesthetic preferences.

- **Consistency in Purchasing:** The user remains committed to practical solutions that marry visual appeal with efficiency across all beauty products, including lipsticks.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** Their evaluation of products is guided by comfort, effectiveness, and aesthetic charm, demonstrating a discerning approach to quality. The user seeks to enhance their beauty routine while adhering to principles of reliability, satisfaction, and environmental awareness.
